title: What is RAG?
text: Retrieval augmented generation combines information retrieval with generative models.

title: FastAPI Basics
text: FastAPI is a modern Python web framework for building APIs with type hints and Pydantic.

title: Vector Search Lite
text: You can approximate semantic retrieval using tf-idf and cosine similarity with a tiny in-memory index.

title: YouTube API Key
text: Create a project in Google Cloud Console and enable YouTube Data API v3 to obtain an API key.

title: Reddit Search
text: Public Reddit JSON endpoints can be queried with a custom user-agent for simple searches.
